sentence.Network_en: Endurance is of the utmost importance in all of the Asana work.
sentence.Network_cn: 耐力是在阿萨纳所有工作至关重要.

sentence.Network_en: Asana keep your body, as well as your mind, healthy and active.
sentence.Network_cn: 体式的练习会保持你的身体和心灵的建康和积极.

sentence.Network_en: Standing postures, then , provide the foundation for other groups of asana.
sentence.Network_cn: 站姿是其它体式的基础.
